error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 480
The total cost of the iPhone will cost Carrie $800 - $240 = $<<800-240=560>>560.
It will take her $560 - $80 = <<560-80=480>>480 weeks to earn enough money.
